description: Try our easy to follow Hawaiian Burger with Fries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Tree nut free,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Beef
name: Hawaiian Burger with Fries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Praise Deli Style Burger Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: To make the pickled onion place the sliced onion and vinegar into a bowl, ensure vinegar covers onion and set aside while preparing the beef patties.
Place the beef, breadcrumbs and tomato sauce in a bowl. Mix well until combined. Divide beef mixture in four and shape into patties.
Preheat a chargrill or barbecue over medium-high heat. Cook patties for 4-5 minutes each side or until cooked through.
Assemble your burger; add some burger sauce to both halves of buns. Add patty, more burger sauce and 2 slices of cheese. Top with sliced gherkins, lettuce, pineapple, red onion and top bun.
Serve with a side of fries with aioli or tomato sauce.
